Text:
[II] Let us rejoice in the Lord, from whom all good things flow. Pray to Him, together with sincerity:
[IR] Lord, hear our prayer.
[I1] Lord and Father of all, who has sent your Son into the world, that your name might be glorified everywhere,
[I2] strengthen the testimony of your Church among the nations.
[I1] May the Apostles preaching easily instruct us,
[I2] to conform our lives to the truth of our faith.
[I1] You, who love the righteous,
[I2] do right for those suffering injustice.
[I1] Deliver the captives, give sight to the blind,
[I2] rebuild the shattered, and care for the migrants.
[I1] Fulfill the promise for those who now sleep in your peace,
[I2] that through your Son they will come to the holy resurrection.
Changes: 2022-06-19 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions
